about:
As a Full-Stack Web Developer, I specialize in developing dynamic, user-focused web applications using a combination of front-end and back-end technologies.


ront-End Development: Expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern libraries/frameworks such as React.js, Vue.js, and Angular. Focus on building responsive, interactive user interfaces that deliver seamless user experiences. Back-End Development: Proficient in server-side programming with Node.js, Express.js, Laravel, and Django. Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices, and backend architecture that ensures efficient data handling and security.
